document.title: [PSN] Mise a jour hebdo du 31/08/2011
document.author: JohnCouscous
document.text:
Hello, voici la mise à jour de la semaine (31/08/2011) sur le PlayStation Network :
PlayStation Store (via PS3, PSP et Media Go) Réduction de prix Blue Toad Murder Files: Episode One est désormais définitivement gratuit Les épisodes de 2 à 6 sont également disponibles. Essai et déblocage (PS3) The Baconing (12.99€) – PEGI 12 20% de reductions pour les abonnés PlayStation Plus Jeux complets (PS3) 4 Elements HD (7.99€) – PEGI 3 Elevator Action Deluxe (9.99€) – PEGI 12 TV Superstars (19.99€) – PEGI 7 minis (PS3 & PSP) Left to Die in Zombhai (2.99€) – PEGI 16 Snowy: The Bear’s Adventures (8.99€) – PEGI 3 BETA (PS3) Resistance 3 Multiplayer Beta – PEGI 18 Démo (PS3) Bodycount Demo – PEGI 18 Ajouts de jeux et contenus (PS3) YooStar 2 – PEGI 12 – I work only 16 hours a day (1.75€) – When the goin’ gets tough (1.75€) – Mrs Hangley’s a lot better than you (1.75€) – The promise of a woman (1.75€) LittleBigPlanet 2 – PEGI 7 – Toy Story 3 Costume Kit (5.99€) – Mr Pricklepants Costume (1.99€) – Lots-o-Huggin’ Bear Costume (1.99€) – Trixie Costume (1.99€) – Dolly Costume (1.99€) Dynasty Warriors Gundam 3 – PEGI 12 – Cherudim Gundam Pack (3.99€) Championship Jockey: G1 Jockey and Gallop Racer – PEGI 3 – Variety Pack (2.49€) Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine – PEGI 18 – Elite Pass (7.99€) Magic: The Gathering – Duels of the Planeswalkers 2012 – PEGI 7 – ‘Ancient Depths’ Full Deck (0.99€) Homefront – PEGI 18 – The Rock Map Pack (3.99€) Street Fighter III: Third Strike Online Edition – PEGI 12 – Street Fighter III Dipswitch Pages (0.99€) Rock Band Network – PEGI 12 – Bed Intruder Song (Feat. Kelly Dodson) by Antoine Dodson & The Gregory Brothers (1.49€) – Betus Blues (Retro Remix) by db Soundworks (0.79€) – Caves by Chiodos (1.49€) – Pray For Plagues by Bring me the Horizon (1.49€) – Turning Sheep Into Goats/Systematomatic by Rishloo (0.79€) Rock Band 3 – PEGI 12 – I’m With the Chili Peppers Pack (9.99€) – Contient les pistes suivantes, également disponibles séparément : – By The Way (1.49€) – Californication (1.49€) – Look Around (1.49€) – Monarchy Of Roses (1.49€) – Otherside (1.49€) – Parallel Universe (1.49€) – Scar Tissue (1.49€) – The Adventures Of Raindance Maggie (1.49€) Thèmes (PS3) Jeux – Spelunker HD Theme (Retro) (gratuit) – Spelunker HD Theme (HD) (gratuit) Abstraits – Military (1.49€) – Skull (1.49€) – Dynamic Blue Flames Theme (1.99€) Animaux – Fish (1.49€) – Monkey Business (1.99€) Natures – Campfire at Night (1.99€) – Dynamic Sea Background Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Volcanic Lava Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Waterfalls Theme (1.99€) Lieux – Destination: Brooklyn Bridge (1.99€) SF/Heroic fantasy – Dynamic Bots Sci-Fi Theme (1.99€) – Dynamic Dragon Warrior Theme (1.99€) – My Pet Zombie Dynamic Theme (1.99€) Sports – CR7 (1.49€) TV/Vidéo – Warner Bro’s ‘Horrible Bosses’ Theme Vidéos (PS3) Gatling Gears Launch Trailer Ace Combat Assault Horizon E3 Trailer Assassin’s Creed Revelations Gamescom Trailer Crazy Machines Elements In-game Trailer Wrecked: Revenge Revisited WeaponsTrailer Resistance 3 Resist Trailer Follow Capelli Trailer The Road Trailer
Pas mal, un jeu gratuit cette semaine, et pour tout le monde : Blue Toad Murder Files ! Ok il s’agit d’un seul épisode sur les 6 disponibles mais c’est une bonne opportunité pour tester ce jeu, qui m’avait plus à l’époque. Par contre ce mois-ci, il n’était pas forcément bon d’être membre PSN , car les surprises du mois on les cherche encore …
